file_content.text: Good hunting!
I'm telling you, Zinny will get you set up right as rain.
Hey, little girl. Aren't you just the cutest thing to ever pick up a blaster.
If you have business to discuss, do so.
What do you want?
Business is exactly what I want to discuss.
Still going to think it's cute when I put a hole through that big head of yours?
You looking to die?
All right, you've got basic powers of observation. Any other useful skills I should know about?
[Flirt] Yes. Yes, I am.
If only, my little lovely, but I'm a taken and guarded man.
Hey, you're Braden's boy, right? Got a minute to talk shop?
You looking to hire someone for a Jiguuna job?
Always.
No, but I could help you with yours.
Not a lot of time for chitchat. What's on your mind?
Make it fast.
I'm a man. You want to test me on it?
A real hardcase, huh? All right, then.
My partner Zinny and I train and supply bounty hunters. Got a little area to test out new gear, the whole bit.
You want to really impress Braden? Go let Zinny show you what she knows.
How are ya?
I'm not anyone's "boy".
You looking to die?
